trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Brimfield
There were no other sightings in Brimfield on or around June 12th 1992
divs: Sighting Detailsas mentioned above,this huge blue shape coming from my left to in front of me. this was no bright light the object was clearly visable at about 3oclock in the morning.as this has affected my whole life,if you really want to see a ufo, go to brimfield ma off rt. 20.this is a warning,do not go there unless your mentally capable to see the real thing. I didn't have a choice, you do.
Summary: football field classic flying saucer shape 200 yards away in back field
